extendedInfo.description: This application contains animated exercises for Bakers cyst which can be done in the convenience and privacy of your own home. A Baker's cyst is a pocket of fluid that forms a lump behind the knee. It is also called a popliteal cyst. Exercises: Stretching Quadriceps Stretch,Stretching : Seated Hamstring Stretch,Heel Slides,Strengthening Wall Slides,Knee Extension,Hamstring Curls. This application is not meant to be used in any medical or legal decision making, or they should contact emergency response 911 when they are in a medical urgent situation for example.

reviews.title: Not for Note 10.1 Tablet
reviews.comment: The app I really needed to move from my phone to the tablet, for the large screen to really see the exercises, and it just crashes.  Meh.
reviews.author: Lawrence Esker
